Title: The activity room of Xiangyangyuan
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Xiangyangyuan ('sun facing courtyard') was an imaginary model neighbourhood from a novel by Xu Ying (徐瑛) and featured in the 1974 film The Story of Xiangyangyuan (向阳院的故事).
Theme: Visualizing the FutureTo Read Too Many Books is Harmful
